buginformation.summary: wrong code generated mixing types ternary operator
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem use google closure compiler compile this code var math random you can either simple advanced doesn matter what the expected output what you see instead seeing this result var math random this obviously wrong the string literal got converted number and got combined into while that not 134 not what version the product are you using what operating system please provide any additional information below seems like this issue happens only when you are mixing types together both and are string literals they are both numbers won happen was also little surprised see this happening simple mode actually breaks the behavior thank you for the report this issue was closed revision 2206
